Classification package

Classification modules

Decision tree module

class autoop.core.ml.model.classification.decision_tree.DecisionTree[source]

Bases: Model

Decision tree model for classification using scikit-learn

fit(observations, ground_truth)[source]

Fits the decision tree to the provided training data. :type observations: ndarray :param observations: Numpy array where each row is a data point. :type ground_truth: ndarray :param ground_truth: Numpy array with the corresponding labels.

Return type:

None

predict(observations)[source]

Predicts the label for each example in the input. :type observations: ndarray :param observations: Numpy array where each row is a data point to predict. :rtype: ndarray :return: Numpy array of predicted labels for each input example.

Random forest module

Module contents

This module contains various machine learning models. It includes functionality for defining, training, and evaluating models for classification.
